Package com.lambdaschool.schools.repositories

Interface ZooRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Zoo,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Zoo,​java.lang.Long>
    public interface ZooRepository
extends org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Zoo,​java.lang.Long>
    The CRUD repository connecting Zoos to the rest of the application

      • findByZoonameContainingIgnoringCase

        java.util.ArrayList<Zoo> findByZoonameContainingIgnoringCase​(java.lang.String name)
        Finds the zoos whose name includes the given substring, case insensitive
        Parameters:
        name - The substring (String) you wish to search for
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of Zoos that you are seeking

      • checkZooAnimalCombo

        @Query(value="SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM zooanimals WHERE zooid = :zooid AND animalid = :animalid",
       nativeQuery=true)
JustTheCount checkZooAnimalCombo​(long zooid,
                                 long animalid)
        Counts the number of course student combinations for a given course student combination
        Parameters:
        zooid - the course id of the course of the course student combination to check
        animalid - the animail id of the student of the course student combination to check
        Returns:
        A single number, a count

      • saveZooAnimalCombo

        @Modifying
@Query(value="INSERT INTO zooanimals (zooid, animalid, incomingzooid, created_by, created_date, last_modified_by, last_modified_date) VALUES (:zooid, :animalid, :incomingzooid, :uname, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, :uname, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)",
       nativeQuery=true)
void saveZooAnimalCombo​(java.lang.String uname,
                        long zooid,
                        long animalid,
                        long incomingzooid)
        Inserts new course student combination
        Parameters:
        uname - The name of the user (String) adding the record
        zooid - the course id of the course of the course student combination to add
        animalid - the student id of the student of the course student combination to add
        incomingzooid - the course id of the course where the student came from.

      • deleteZooAnimalCombo

        @Modifying
@Query(value="DELETE FROM zooanimals WHERE zooid = :zooid AND animalid = :animalid",
       nativeQuery=true)
void deleteZooAnimalCombo​(long zooid,
                          long animalid)
        Deletes the given course student combination
        Parameters:
        zooid - the course id of the course of the course student combination to delete
        animalid - the student id of the student of the course student combination to delete
